snippet: The oversight panel of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision issued a statement on Sunday saying that while more liquidity was always better, that did not mean banks would never be allowed to dip below required levels, Susanne Craig of The New...
abstract: The oversight panel of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision issued a statement on Sunday saying that while more liquidity was always better, that did not mean banks would never be allowed to dip below required levels, Susanne Craig of The New York Times reports.

headline.main: Bank Regulators to Allow Leeway on Liquidity Rule
